resources: Affirmations Power Resides, where men believe it resides.string> The Greatest Punch was the one you never threw.string> Every ambitious move is a gamble.string> Know your enemy, know thyself and you shall not fear a hundred battles.string> Guilt before the act is called Morality.string> Limits, just like fear are often an illusion.string> Definition excludes the possibility for change.string> Better a witty fool, than a foolish wit.string> The purpose of fiction is to combat loneliness.string> A lie is just a great story that someone ruined with the truth.string>
